panel1.resumen: SELECT COUNT(f.CVE_DOC) registros, SUM(f.CAN_TOT) importe FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC = cast('YESTERDAY' as date)
panel1.detalle: SELECT f.CVE_DOC, c.NOMBRE, f.STATUS,f.FECHA_DOC, f.CVE_VEND, f.CAN_TOT FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC = cast('YESTERDAY' as date)

panel2.resumen: SELECT COUNT(f.CVE_DOC) registros, SUM(f.CAN_TOT) importe FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC >= :fechaInicio AND FECHA_DOC <= :fechaFin
panel2.detalle: SELECT f.CVE_DOC, c.NOMBRE, f.STATUS,f.FECHA_DOC, f.CVE_VEND, f.CAN_TOT FROM FACTF01 f INNER JOIN clie01 c ON f.CVE_CLPV =c.CLAVE WHERE FECHA_DOC >= :fechaInicio AND FECHA_DOC <= :fechaFin

panel3.resumen: SELECT COUNT(CLAVE) registros, SUM(SALDO) importe FROM CLIE01 WHERE SALDO > 1
panel3.detalle: SELECT CLAVE, STATUS, NOMBRE, ESTADO, TELEFONO, DIASCRED, LIMCRED, SALDO FROM CLIE01 WHERE SALDO > 1

panel4.resumen: SELECT COUNT(f.CVE_DOC) registros, SUM(f.IMPORTE) importe FROM FACTP01 f INNER JOIN CLIE01 c ON c.CLAVE=f.CVE_CLPV INNER JOIN vend01 v ON v.CVE_VEND=f.CVE_VEND WHERE f.status= 'E' AND f.TIP_DOC_SIG IS NULL
panel4.detalle: SELECT f.CVE_DOC, c.NOMBRE , f.FECHA_DOC, f.IMPORTE, v.NOMBRE FROM FACTP01 f INNER JOIN CLIE01 c ON c.CLAVE=f.CVE_CLPV INNER JOIN vend01 v ON v.CVE_VEND=f.CVE_VEND WHERE f.status= 'E' AND f.TIP_DOC_SIG IS NULL
